title: Is it better to buy a Garmin smartwatch for hiking or a simple Garmin GPS device? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why not use the GPS in your smartphone? You can download maps and view them on a screen with 5–10 times more pixels than a watch display. The GPS in smartphones may be slightly less accurate than a dedicated GPS device, but it’s still within a few meters. Plenty good enough for hiking.
